price: Algunos de Mi creación guían [a la gente] con la Verdad, y acorde a ella establecen justicia.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
